item.title: 2023 – Around Didsbury, Manchester, UK
item.dc:creator: grscott
item.description: Our year volunteering at Nazarene Theological College, Manchester passed quickly. We very much enjoyed our neighborhood, Didsbury. There are many nice restaurants and shops in “the Village.” The area also has several beautiful parks. We loved the beautiful colors of autumn and spring. As you might guess we took many photos!
item.content:encoded: Our year volunteering at Nazarene Theological College, Manchester passed quickly. We very much enjoyed our neighborhood, Didsbury. There are many nice restaurants and shops in “the Village.” The area also has several beautiful parks. We loved the beautiful colors of autumn and spring. As you might guess we took many photos!
